list_definition.definition: to clip or cut wool from (a sheep)
(past tense shorn) (often with off) to cut (hair) off

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: All her curls have been shorn off.

list_definition.definition: (past tense shorn) (especially with of) to cut hair from (someone)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He has been shorn (of all his curls).

list_definition.mean_english: làm méo mó, làm đứt gãy

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: A piece of the steel girder sheared off.
